text: Clube de Autores (founded in 2009) is a major self-publishing platform in Latin America, with a main focus on the Brazilian market. It is headquartered in Joinville, Santa Catarina, Brazil. Clube de Autores claims to publish about 10% of the books in Brazil. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2009 establishments in South America Category:2000s establishments in Brazil
title: Clube de Autores
